# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)
project(great-loader LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)

# target
add_executable(great-loader "")
set_target_properties(great-loader PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "great-loader")
set_target_properties(great-loader PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(great-loader PRIVATE
    /home/myuan/.xmake/packages/a/apache-arrow/master/4e0143c97b65425b855ad5fd03038b6a/include
)
target_compile_options(great-loader PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(great-loader PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(great-loader PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
target_link_libraries(great-loader PRIVATE
    arrow_bundled_dependencies
    arrow
)
target_link_directories(great-loader PRIVATE
    /home/myuan/.xmake/packages/a/apache-arrow/master/4e0143c97b65425b855ad5fd03038b6a/lib
)
target_link_options(great-loader PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(great-loader PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
